Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
This class provides all the functionality of the backend. It is responsible for using ChatGPT to generate the trivia questions for the player, checking whether they were correct or not, and building the queue representation of the progress report, as well as the 2D array complement.

  • Field Details

    • answerSubmitted

      public boolean answerSubmitted
      false when user is answering so that the side scroll doesn't keep moving forward. true when the board needs to keep moving.

      the area where the submit button, the question, and the textfield are shown

      conversation with the user is shown

      public String[][] getQuestionReport()

      Returns:
      Question Report of user data

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible​(boolean visible)
      Sets the frame to be visible or not.
      Parameters:
      visible - if true, makes visible, if false, makes invisible

    • clearQA

      public void clearQA()
      Once the user has submitted an answer, it replaces the question dialogue. It lets the user know if more is coming up or if they are done. It also clears the answer box.

    • generateQA

      public void generateQA()
      Checks if user has reached end of the game (if the user has finished 8 questions), displaying EndScreen if they have. Otherwise, it creates the question, processes it, adds it to questionreport, and then displays the question and dialogue. It also takes in the user's answer and sends it to be checked with checkAnswer.

    • checkAnswer

      public void checkAnswer​(String uAnswer, String q)
      Checks whether the user is correct or not. Sets values in the final user report for their question, their answer, and whether they got it right or not. Also determines whether they will recieve a popup that says they are correct or incorrect.
      Parameters:
      uAnswer - user's answer.
      q - question asked

    • endMessage

      public void endMessage()
      Is responsible for creating a queue of correct and wrong answers. It iterates through map and adds to correct queue. It uses this information to calculate percentages for bar graph and to create it.

    • chatGPT

      public static String chatGPT​(String text) throws Exception
      Initializes connection to openAI API, passes the query and saves the response.
      Parameters:
      text - user's query to chatgpt
      Returns:
      chatgpt's response
      Throws:
      Exception - if cannot connect to openAI
